parameters.query:
-- KPIs Dernières 24h
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours') as opportunites_24h,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE statut = 'ACHAT_PRIORITAIRE') as a_acheter,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE statut = 'EN_VENTE') as en_vente,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE statut = 'VENDU') as vendus_total,
  AVG(score) FILTER (WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours') as score_moyen,
  SUM(prix_achat) FILTER (WHERE statut IN ('EN_VENTE', 'VENDU')) as capital_engage,
  SUM(prix_vente) FILTER (WHERE statut = 'VENDU') as ca_total,
  SUM(prix_vente - prix_achat) FILTER (WHERE statut = 'VENDU') as profit_total
FROM opportunites;

-- Top 10 opportunités manquées
SELECT 
  titre,
  prix_achat,
  score,
  marques_detectees->>'marque' as marque,
  facteurs->>'roi_estime' as roi_estime,
  created_at
FROM opportunites
WHERE score > 0.8 
  AND statut = 'DETECTE'
  AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY score DESC
LIMIT 10;

-- Performance par marque
SELECT 
  marques_detectees->>'marque' as marque,
  COUNT(*) as nombre_total,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE statut = 'VENDU') as nombre_vendus,
  AVG(score) as score_moyen,
  AVG((prix_vente - prix_achat)::float / NULLIF(prix_achat, 0)) as roi_moyen,
  SUM(prix_vente - prix_achat) FILTER (WHERE statut = 'VENDU') as profit_total
FROM opportunites
WHERE marques_detectees IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY marque
ORDER BY profit_total DESC NULLS LAST;
